exclusion.criterion: Receiving probiotic and/or prebiotic products 7 days prior to enrolment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of red flags: Weight loss of more than 10%
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of red flags: Growth retardation or growth failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of red flags: Extraintestinal symptoms (fever, rash, joint pain, aphthae, affection of the urinary system)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of red flags: Frequent vomiting
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has profuse watery diarrhea without odor, reduced skin turgor and dry mucosa. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
